alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene; Owen; Sullivan; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:15AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Vigo, northeastern Sullivan, southwestern Clay, southwestern Owen and northwestern Greene Counties through 545 AM EDT... At 515 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northeast of Sullivan, or 15 miles southeast of Terre Haute, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Vigo, northeastern Sullivan, southwestern Clay, southwestern Owen and northwestern Greene Counties, including the following locations... Patricksburg, Hymera, Coalmont, Coal City, Pimento, Shelburn, Worthington, Clay City, Farmersburg and Jasonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
